relation: Darrow5 - #43 Though he could really use the defense, Ness forgoes buying the Platinum Band in exchange for buying Paula the Super Plush Bear. Sure, he loses defensive points, but those boyfriend points are going through the roof.
Darrow5 - #44 Remember, the next time you enter a taxi, check to make sure your driver is not a sign of some sort. If they have numbers on their face, that may be a dead giveaway.
Darrow5 - #45 Killer taxis, crazy signs...Either Giygas is getting desperate, or trying to outdo every other villain by having the most diverse evil army imaginable.
Darrow5 - #46 Although they have yet to meet face to face, Poo develops a deep hatred towards Pokey for the insult to Ness' name. This does not bode well for Pokey's future.
Darrow5 - #47 Ness continues to search around for the captain, only to discover a man who...really likes cats.
